text: @Yamiche Such a flip-flopping, political opportunist president who caved to douche bags that attacked Democratic governors over Covid. They were trying to keep people safe. Dumbest, most danger POTUS ever. #trump #covid19 #covid_19 #coronavirus #covid #Wisconsin #wisconsinelections
